pages.text: Lilith, the mountain-mother of $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$() is often addressed to grant victims of $(l:bewitchment:curses/vampirism)Vampirism$() higher powers.$(br2)$(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledging$() to her allows them to freely change their form into that of a bat, allowing them to roam freely. Alternatively, she can be be offered $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)Garlic$(), freeing the victim of her $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$().

pages.title: Summoning Lilith
pages.text: To summon Lilith, several things are needed:$(li)a $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier#mortal_coil)Mortal Coil Incense$()$(li)a Chicken $(li)a mountain or icy biome$(br2)First, start the $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier#incense)Incense$() in the right biome, at night. Then you will need to slay a Chicken with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$(), not too far away.

You'll want to keep Lilith around if you want to $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledge$() to her, so decide where to summon her wisely.$(br2)Once $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledged$(), you can toggle your bat-form by pressing [$(k:bewitchment.transformation_ability)].
